clues: A historic park featuring a beautiful garden and scenic views of San Francisco Bay.
It includes walking trails, a pond, and several historical monuments.
Look for the large gazebo and picnic areas.
Locations.description: A popular park in San Francisco known for its picturesque landscapes and family-friendly environment.
Locations.name: Golden Gate Park

clues: This historic site is known for its role in the early development of San Francisco.
It features a museum with exhibits on local history and a preserved 19th-century building.
Look for the old brick building with a clock tower.
Locations.description: A local museum offering insights into the early history of San Francisco and its development.
Locations.name: San Francisco History Museum

clues: A well-known landmark offering panoramic views of the city and the Bay Area.
It features an observation deck and is a popular spot for tourists.
Look for the tall tower with a revolving restaurant.
Locations.description: An iconic observation tower providing stunning views of San Francisco and its surroundings.
Locations.name: Coit Tower
